verses.text: PEA hili ia na‘e fakahā kia Siosifa, Kuo vaivai ho‘o ‘eiki; pea na‘a ne ‘alu mo ia ki ai hono ongo foha ko Manase mo ‘Ifalemi.
Pea na‘e fakahā kia Sēkope, ‘o pehē, Ko ho foha ko Siosifa kuo ha‘u kiate koe: pea fai ‘a ‘Isileli ‘aki ‘a e toe ‘o hono ivi, ‘o ne nofo hake ‘i he mohenga.
Pea pehē ‘e Sēkope kia Siosifa, Ko e ‘Otua ko Sātai na ne hā kiate au ‘i Lusa ‘i he fonua ko Kēnani, pea na‘a ne tāpuaki au, pea ne folofola mai,
Ko au eni te u ngaohi koe ke fai hako, pea te u fakauōuōtu‘u koe, pea te u tuku ke ke hoko ko e koto kakai, pea te u ‘atu ‘a e fonua ni ki ho hako ‘amui ko e tofi‘a ta‘engata.

Pea ko eni ko ho ongo foha na‘e fanau kiate koe ‘i ‘Isipite, ‘i he te‘eki te u ha‘u kiate koe ki ‘Isipite, ‘oku ‘o‘oku ‘a kinaua; ‘e ‘o‘oku ‘a Manase mo ‘Ifalemi, ‘o hangē ‘oku ‘o‘oku ‘a Lūpeni mo Simione.
Ka ko ho hako ‘a ia te ke ma‘u ‘amui, ‘e ‘o‘ou ia; ‘e ui ‘a kinautolu ‘aki ‘a e hingoa ‘o honau ongo ta‘okete ‘i honau tofi‘a.

Pea ko au ‘i he‘eku ha‘u mei Mesopotēmia, na‘e pekia ‘i hoku tafa‘aki ‘a Lesieli ‘i he fonua ko Kēnani, ‘i he fononga, ‘i he toe pē ha vaa‘i hala pea mau a‘u ki ‘Efalata: pea na‘a ku tanu ia ‘i he hala ki ‘Efalata (‘a ia ko Pētelihema).
Pea sio ‘e ‘Isileli ki he ongo foha ‘o Siosifa, pea ne pehē, Ko hai ‘a kinaua na?
Pea tali ‘e Siosifa ki he‘ene ‘eiki, Ko ‘eku fānau ia kuo foaki kiate au ‘e he ‘Otua ‘i he potu ni. Pea ne pehē, ‘Omi mu‘a kinaua kiate au ka u tāpuaki‘i kinaua.
Pea kuo nenefu ‘a e fofonga ‘o ‘Isileli ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene motu‘a, pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne lava ke sio. Ko ia na‘a ne fakaofiofi kinaua kiate ia; pea na‘a ne ‘uma kiate kinaua, mo fā‘ofua ki ai.
Pea lea ‘a ‘Isileli kia Siosifa, Na‘e ‘ikai te u ‘amanaki te u sio ki ho mata; ka ko eni kuo tuku ‘e he ‘Otua ke u sio ki ho hako foki.
Pea ‘omi kinaua ‘e Siosifa mei hono vaha‘a tui: pea ne tulolo ‘o punou ki he kelekele.
Pea puke ‘a Siosifa kiate kinaua, ko ‘Ifalemi ‘i hono to‘omata‘u fe‘unga mo e to‘ohema ‘o ‘Isileli, pea ko Manase ‘i hono to‘ohema ke fe‘unga mo e to‘omata‘u ‘o ‘Isileli, pea ne ‘unuaki atu kiate ia.

Pea mafao atu ‘e ‘Isileli hono nima to‘omata‘u, ‘o ne ai ki he ‘ulu ‘o ‘Ifalemi ‘a ia ko e tehina, pea ne ‘ai hono to‘ohema ki he ‘ulu ‘o Manase; ‘o ne ‘ai ‘ilo pē hono nima ke pehē, neongo ko Manase ko e ta‘okete.
Pea na‘a ne tāpuaki‘i ‘a Siosifa, ‘o ne pehē, Ko e ‘Otua, ‘a ia na‘e taka ‘i hono ‘ao ‘a ‘eku mātu‘a ko ‘Epalahame mo ‘Aisake; ko e ‘Otua kuo ne tauhi au talu ‘eku ‘i ai, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni;

ko e ‘Āngelo kuo ne huhu‘i au mei he kovi kotoa pē, ‘ofa ke ne tāpuaki‘i ‘a e ongo tama ni; pea ke ui‘aki ‘a kinaua hoku hingoa, mo e hingoa ‘o ‘eku mātu‘a ko ‘Epalahame mo ‘Aisake: pea ke na tupu hangē ko e ika, ‘o opeope ‘i he fonua.

Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e Siosifa kuo ‘ai ‘e he‘ene ‘eiki hono nima to‘omata‘u ki he ‘ulu ‘o ‘Ifalemi, na‘a ne kovi‘ia ai: pea na‘a ne puke ‘a e nima ‘o ‘ene ‘eiki ke hiki mei he ‘ulu ‘o ‘Ifalemi ki he ‘ulu ‘o Manase.
Pea ne pehē ki he‘ene ‘eiki, ‘Alā, ‘oua ‘e pehē: he ko eni ‘a e ta‘okete; ‘ai ho to‘omata‘u ki hono ‘ulu ‘o‘ona.

Ka ka fakafisi ‘e he‘ene tamai, ‘o ne pehē, ‘Oku ou ‘ilo pē, nga‘ata, ‘oku ou ‘ilo pē: ‘e hoko mo ia foki ko e kakai, pea te ne mā‘olunga foki: ka neongo ia ka ‘e hulu atu hono tehina ‘iate ia, pea ‘e hoko hono hako ko e koto kakai.

Pea ne tāpuaki‘i kinaua ‘i he ‘aho ko ia, ‘o pehē, ‘E lea‘aki koe ‘e ‘Isileli ‘i he‘enau fai tāpuaki, he‘enau pehē, ‘Ofa ke ngaohi koe ‘e he ‘Otua ke hangē ko ‘Ifalemi mo Manase: pea ne tuku kimu‘a ‘a ‘Ifalemi ‘ia Manase.
Pea lea ‘a ‘Isileli kia Siosifa, Ko eni kuo u mate au: ka ‘e ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e ‘Otua, pea te ne fakafoki kimoutolu ki he fonua ‘o ho‘omou ngaahi kui.
Pea kuo u ‘atu kiate koe ha konga fonua ‘e taha ‘o lahi hake ‘i ho ngaahi tokoua, ‘a e konga ne u to‘o mei he kau ‘Āmoli, ‘aki ‘eku heletā mo ‘eku kaufana.
